def modify_features(df_input) -> pd.DataFrame:
    """
    Thought 1: The absolute difference between Left-Weight and Right-Weight can capture the imbalance in weight distribution.
    New Feature 1: weight_difference | weight_difference = abs(Left-Weight - Right-Weight)
    """
    import pandas as pd
    import numpy as np

    import pandas as pd
    import numpy as np

    df_output = df_input.copy()

    # Calculating the difference between total weight and total distance on each side
    df_output['left_balance'] = df_output['Left-Weight'] - df_output['Left-Distance']
    df_output['right_balance'] = df_output['Right-Weight'] - df_output['Right-Distance']

    # Creating a feature to represent the relative balance of weight to distance on each side
    df_output['left_balance_ratio'] = df_output['Left-Weight'] / df_output['Left-Distance']
    df_output['right_balance_ratio'] = df_output['Right-Weight'] / df_output['Right-Distance']

    return df_output
